long_description: The waterproof, breathable Outdoor Research Foray shell pants with all-season features easily shrug off trail wear-and-tear and provide solid protection when a downpour sets in. Foray pants work as hard as you do, but pack down tight into their own pocket once the weather breaks. Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) is engineered specifically to be light, packable and more breathable than other 2- or 3-layer Gore-Tex fabrics. Features an elastic drawcord waist for a secure fit. Water-resistant, 3/4-length, double-separating side zippers provide easy on/off and multiple ventilation options. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees ensure easy movement. Cuffs have snap closures and loops for instep laces, not included. Rear pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Outdoor Research Foray pants have a standard fit that eases layering.
short_description: The waterproof, breathable Outdoor Research Foray shell pants with all-season features easily shrug off trail wear-and-tear and provide solid protection when a downpour sets in.
